console-uart.help: Target has UART console on pins STDIO_UART_TX, STDIO_UART_RX. Value is only significant if target has SERIAL device.

console-uart-flow-control.help: Console hardware flow control. Options: null, RTS, CTS, RTSCTS.

network-default-interface-type.help: Default network interface type. Typical options: null, ETHERNET, WIFI, CELLULAR, MESH

deep-sleep-latency.help: Time in ms required to go to and wake up from deep sleep (max 10)

boot-stack-size.help: Define the boot stack size in bytes. This value must be a multiple of 8

mpu-rom-end.help: Last address of ROM protected by the MPU

default-form-factor.help: Default form factor of this board taken from supported_form_factors. This must be a lowercase string such as 'arduino'

tickless-from-us-ticker.help: Run tickless from the microsecond ticker rather than the low power ticker. Running tickless off of the microsecond ticker improves interrupt latency on targets which use lpticker_delay_ticks

init-us-ticker-at-boot.help: Initialize the microsecond ticker at boot rather than on first use, and leave it initialized. This speeds up wait_us in particular.

xip-enable.help: Enable Execute In Place (XIP) on this target. Value is only significant if the board has executable external storage such as QSPIF. If this is enabled, customize the linker file to choose what text segments are placed on external storage

secure-rom-size.help: Size in bytes of Secure ROM

non-secure-rom-size.help: Size in bytes of Non-secure ROM

secure-ram-size.help: Size in bytes of Secure RAM

non-secure-ram-size.help: Size in bytes of Non-secure RAM

shared-ram-start.help: Starting address of Shared RAM between Secure and Non-secure worlds

shared-ram-size.help: Size in bytes of Shared RAM between Secure and Non-secure worlds

public-ram-start.help: Starting address of Public RAM for variables accessible from Non-secure worlds

public-ram-size.help: Size in bytes of Public RAM variables accessible from Non-secure worlds

us-ticker-timer.help: Chooses which timer (0-3) to use for us_ticker.c

lse_available.help: Define if a Low Speed External xtal (LSE) is available on the board (0 = No, 1 = Yes). If Yes, the LSE will be used to clock the RTC, LPUART, ... otherwise the Low Speed Internal clock (LSI) will be used

lpuart_clock_source.help: Define the LPUART clock source. Mask values: USE_LPUART_CLK_LSE, USE_LPUART_CLK_PCLK1, USE_LPUART_CLK_HSI

stdio_uart_tx.help: default TX STDIO pins is defined in PinNames.h file, but it can be overridden

stdio_uart_rx.help: default RX STDIO pins is defined in PinNames.h file, but it can be overridden

lpticker_lptim_clock.help: Default value for LPTIM clock (lpticker_lptim == 1). Value is the dividing factor. Choose 1, 2 or 4

clock_source.help: Mask value : USE_PLL_HSE_EXTC | USE_PLL_HSE_XTAL (need HW patch) | USE_PLL_HSI

BLE_STACK_UBX.help: It should be set to true to enable ublox ODIN own stack/driver rather than CORDIO

hf_clock_src.help: Value: HFXO for external crystal, HFRCO for internal RC oscillator

hfxo_clock_freq.help: Value: External crystal frequency in hertz

lf_clock_src.help: Value: LFXO for external crystal, LFRCO for internal RC oscillator, ULFRCO for internal 1KHz RC oscillator

lfxo_clock_freq.help: Value: External crystal frequency in hertz

hfrco_clock_freq.help: Value: Frequency in hertz, must correspond to setting of hfrco_band_select

hfrco_band_select.help: Value: One of _CMU_HFRCOCTRL_BAND_28MHZ, _CMU_HFRCOCTRL_BAND_21MHZ, _CMU_HFRCOCTRL_BAND_14MHZ, _CMU_HFRCOCTRL_BAND_11MHZ, _CMU_HFRCOCTRL_BAND_7MHZ, _CMU_HFRCOCTRL_BAND_1MHZ. Be sure to set hfrco_clock_freq accordingly!

hfrco_band_select.help: Value: One of cmuHFRCOFreq_1M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_2M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_4M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_7M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_13M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_16M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_19M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_26M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_32M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_38M0Hz. Be sure to set hfrco_clock_freq accordingly!

hf_clock_src.help: Value: HFXO for external crystal, HFRCO for internal RC oscillator

hfxo_clock_freq.help: Value: External crystal frequency in hertz

lf_clock_src.help: Value: LFXO for external crystal, LFRCO for internal RC oscillator, ULFRCO for internal 1KHz RC oscillator

lfxo_clock_freq.help: Value: External crystal frequency in hertz

hfrco_clock_freq.help: Value: Frequency in hertz, must correspond to setting of hfrco_band_select

hfrco_band_select.help: Value: One of cmuHFRCOFreq_1M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_2M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_4M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_7M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_13M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_16M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_19M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_26M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_32M0Hz, cmuHFRCOFreq_38M0Hz. Be sure to set hfrco_clock_freq accordingly!

board_controller_enable.help: Pin to pull high for enabling the USB serial port

qspi_flash_enable.help: Pin to pull high for enabling the on-board QSPI flash

lf_clock_src.help: Select Low Frequency clock source. Options: NRF_LF_SRC_XTAL, NRF_LF_SRC_SYNTH, and NRF_LF_SRC_RC

uart_0_fifo_size.help: UART0 FIFO buffer. FIFO buffer is filled from DMA buffer.

uart_1_fifo_size.help: UART1 FIFO buffer. FIFO buffer is filled from DMA buffer.

gpio-irq-debounce-enable-list.help: Comma separated pin list to enable GPIO IRQ debounce

gpio-irq-debounce-clock-source.help: Select GPIO IRQ debounce clock source: GPIO_DBCTL_DBCLKSRC_HCLK or GPIO_DBCTL_DBCLKSRC_IRC10K

gpio-irq-debounce-sample-rate.help: Select GPIO IRQ debounce sample rate: GPIO_DBCTL_DBCLKSEL_1, GPIO_DBCTL_DBCLKSEL_2, GPIO_DBCTL_DBCLKSEL_4, ..., or GPIO_DBCTL_DBCLKSEL_32768

mac-addr-low.help: Lower 32 bits of the MAC extended address. All FFs indicates that factory programmed MAC address shall be used. In order to override the factory programmed MAC address this value needs to be changed from 0xFFFFFFFF to any chosen value.

mac-addr-high.help: Higher 32 bits of the MAC extended address. All FFs indicates that factory programmed MAC address shall be used. In order to override the factory programmed MAC address this value needs to be changed from 0xFFFFFFFF to any chosen value.

m0-clock.help: Desired frequency of M0+ core clock (Hz)
Desired frequency of M0+ core clock (Hz)

hfxt_hz.help: Defines the HFXT frequency in Hz (e.g. 48000000)

lfxt_hz.help: Defines the LFXT frequency in Hz (e.g. 32768)

dco_rsel.help: Defines the DCO center frequency (3/6/12/24/48 MHz)

mclk_select.accepted_values: LFXT, VLO, REFO, DCO, MOD, HFXT

mclk_div.accepted_values: DIV1, DIV2, DIV4, DIV8, DIV16, DIV32, DIV64, DIV128

smclk_select.accepted_values: LFXT, VLO, REFO, DCO, MOD, HFXT

smclk_div.accepted_values: DIV1, DIV2, DIV4, DIV8, DIV16, DIV32, DIV64, DIV128

adc_auto_scan.help: Enables automatic conversion of all ADC channels

lpticker_lptim.help: This target supports LPTIM. Set value 1 to use LPTIM for LPTICKER, or 0 to use RTC wakeup timer

hse_value.help: HSE default value is 25MHz in HAL

lse_available.help: Define if a Low Speed External xtal (LSE) is available on the board (0 = No, 1 = Yes). If Yes, the LSE will be used to clock the RTC, LPUART, ... otherwise the Low Speed Internal clock (LSI) will be used

lpuart_clock_source.help: Define the LPUART clock source. Mask values: USE_LPUART_CLK_LSE, USE_LPUART_CLK_PCLK1, USE_LPUART_CLK_HSI

stdio_uart_tx.help: default TX STDIO pins is defined in PinNames.h file, but it can be overridden

stdio_uart_rx.help: default RX STDIO pins is defined in PinNames.h file, but it can be overridden

lpticker_lptim_clock.help: Default value for LPTIM clock (lpticker_lptim == 1). Value is the dividing factor. Choose 1, 2 or 4

gpio_reset_at_init.help: if value set, all GPIO are reset during init

lpticker_lptim.help: This target supports LPTIM. Set value 1 to use LPTIM for LPTICKER, or 0 to use RTC wakeup timer

lse_drive_load_level.help: HSE drive load level  RCC_LSEDRIVE_LOW | RCC_LSEDRIVE_MEDIUMLOW | RCC_LSEDRIVE_MEDIUMHIGH | RCC_LSEDRIVE_HIGH
